abstract: Liverpool's place in the standings is only one reflection of the dramatic turnaround that has taken place since Kenny Dalglish took over.
snippet: Liverpool's place in the standings is only one reflection of the dramatic turnaround that has taken place since Kenny Dalglish took over.
lead_paragraph: Liverpool fans well recall just how deflated Anfield seemed when a League Two side, Northampton, sent the Reds crashing out of the Carling Cup at the first opportunity last September.

headline.main: At Liverpool, the Statistics Sometimes Lie
